name: Warehouse Robot Takedown
description:
Warehouse Robot Takedown is a top-down turn-based puzzle shooter where you have to work with everyone in your squad to take down the sound-activated armed cleaning robots that have gone rogue in a large warehouse.

This is my first ever game that I'll be publicly submitting... ever! So I really hope you enjoy it, and I appreciate all feedback given!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Click - Shoot/Change to next squad member

R - Centre Camera

Credits:

Game and art done by SilviaFox

Resources used:

Fonts: 
Fipps by pheist
Pixeled by OmegaPC777
Rainyhearts by Camellina

Minimal WebGL Template by Sean

Programs used:
LMMS, Unity, Aesprite, SFXR
